db:article.db:para: SQLite is a small C library that implements a self-contained, embeddable, zero-configuration SQL database engine.
Used in Qt SQL Lite plugin. Configure Qt with -system-sqlite or -no-sqlite to avoid.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/3rdparty/sqlite.
db:article.db:programlisting: The authors disclaim copyright to the source code. However, a license can be obtained if needed.

The author disclaims copyright to this source code. In place of a legal notice, here is a blessing:
May you do good and not evil. May you find forgiveness for yourself and forgive others. May you share freely, never taking more than you give.
